name: Infinite Super Brick Breaker
description:
- Brick Breaker is a Breakout game in which the player must smash a wall of bricks by deflecting a bouncing ball with a paddle. The paddle may move horizontally to catch the bouncing balls.

- When all the bricks have been destroyed, the player advances to a new level. There are many versions of brick breaker, some in which you can shoot flaming fireballs or play with more than one ball if the player gets a power up.

- And now we bring the game to the next level. A whole new level, a super , ultimate level.
With Infinite Super Brick Breaker we'll you to infinity and beyond ...
- You can play as long as you can, as you want. No levels, just play the game and see how far you can go.

Features :

- Collect balls to break more bricks. There are 5 types of ball items :
+ White ball item give you 1 ball.
+ Green ball item give you 2 balls.
+ Red ball item give you 3 balls.
+ Violet ball item give you 4 balls.
+ Blue balls item give you 5 balls.

- But beware of wormholes. The wormholes will eat balls and bring them to the infinity until they are full. There are 5 types of wormholes :
+ White wormhole need 2 balls to be full.
+ Green wormhole need 4 balls to be full.
+ Red wormhole need 6 balls.
+ Violet one need 8 balls.
+ Blue one need 10 balls.

So, that's all information you need to know to travel in Infinite Super Brick Breaker.
Go luck and enjoy the game !

To infinity and beyond...
